snippet: State investigators on Friday accused the former defense minister, Anatoly E. Serdyukov, of obstructing a corruption investigation into real estate dealings by the Defense Ministry.
abstract: Russian investigators accuse former defense minister Anatoly E Serdyukov of obstructing corruption investigation into real estate dealings by Defense Ministry, and suggest that he might face criminal charges.
lead_paragraph: State investigators on Friday accused the former defense minister, Anatoly E. Serdyukov, of obstructing a corruption investigation into real estate dealings by the Defense Ministry.
